title: amaaya karuNaa
sahitya:
amAya karuNA vAhini mAmava himAdri nandini vishva vimOhini

anupallavi

kumAra gaja mukha janani manOnmaNi kumAra satpura dEsha nivAsini

caraNam

suma shara hara ramaNi shubha kAriNi su-mahita nigama tritaya vihAriNi 
su-manOhAriNi vimalaAkAriNi su-madhura vana tulasIdala dhAriNi
